title: A Maitresse P. Omnibus Collection
description: Maîtresse P. introduces a two-volume edition of taut and edgy erotic tales starring some of erotic fiction’s hottest, wanton women, and randy studs. Anti-heroes, these are guys who can be guaranteed to satisfy women, make off with your wife, and leave you feeling the cuckold. Tailor-made for erotic pulp novices and hard-boiled fans, this collection shows that some writing has an edge that time just can’t dull.
author: Maitresse P.
